Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Cost Description
1 Poison Point 12 Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.
1 Poison Touch 15 May poison a target when the Pokémon makes contact.
18 Grass Pelt 11 Boosts the Pokémon's Defensive stats on Grassy Terrain.
36 Mimicry 12 Changes the Pokémon's type depending on the terrain.
54 Sap Sipper 27 Boosts the Attack stat if hit by a Grass-type move instead of taking damage.
72 Lingering Aroma 27 Contact with the Pokémon changes all attacker's Abilities to Lingering Aroma.
90 Adaptability 60 Powers up moves of the same type as the Pokémon.
100 Storm Drain 16 The Pokémon draws in and neutralises Water-type moves, boosting its Sp. Atk.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Cost Description
Disc 05 Immunity 11 The immune system of the Pokémon prevents it from getting poisoned.
Disc 13 Cloud Nine 27 Eliminates the effects of weather.
Disc 16 Lifelink 8 The Pokémon recovers some HP when it deals damage.
Disc 18 Mimicry 12 Changes the Pokémon's type depending on the terrain.
Disc 24 Frostproof 12 The Pokémon resists Ice-type moves and damage from frostbite.
Disc 27 Sludge Rush 28 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat on Noxious Terrain.
Disc 34 Water Absorb 24 Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move instead of taking damage.
Disc 51 Cecity -2 This Pokémon's poor eyesight makes its moves more likely to miss.
Disc 52 Damp 2 Prevents the use of explosive moves, such as Self-Destruct, by dampening its surroundings.
Disc 54 Storm Drain 16 The Pokémon draws in and neutralises Water-type moves, boosting its Sp. Atk.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Cost Description
Adaptability 60 Powers up moves of the same type as the Pokémon.
Chlorolize 68 Normal-type moves become Grass-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Chlorophyll 49 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in harsh sunlight.
Cold-Blooded 49 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in harsh sunlight.
Defeatist -54 Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
Distillize 68 Normal-type moves become Water-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Fumigate 68 Normal-type moves become Poison-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Grass Pelt 11 Boosts the Pokémon's Defensive stats on Grassy Terrain.
High Entropy 27 Boosts the Pokémon's Evasiveness under Gravity.
Hydration 27 Heals status conditions if it's raining.
Insomnia 10 The Pokémon is suffering from insomnia and cannot fall asleep.
Klutz -39 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Leaf Guard 11 Prevents status conditions in harsh sunlight.
Limber 10 Its limber body protects the Pokémon from paralysis.
Lingering Aroma 27 Contact with the Pokémon changes all attacker's Abilities to Lingering Aroma.
Mycelium Might -1 Status moves act more slowly, but they are unaffected by the foe's abilities.
Natural Cure 27 All status conditions heal when the Pokémon switches out.
Overgrow 13 Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.
Poison Point 12 Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.
Poison Touch 15 May poison a target when the Pokémon makes contact.
Predictable -1 This Pokémon's predictable maneuvers make moves hit against it without fail.
Purifying Salt 59 The Pokémon's salt protects it from statuses and halves damage from Ghost-type moves.
Rain Dish 11 The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.
Ripen 49 Ripens Berries and doubles their effect.
Sap Sipper 27 Boosts the Attack stat if hit by a Grass-type move instead of taking damage.
Shield Dust 11 This Pokémon's dust blocks the additional effects of attacks taken.
Slow Start -75 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Stall -27 The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.
Stench 2 By releasing stench when attacking, this Pokémon may cause the target to flinch.
Swift Swim 46 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in rain.
Symbiosis 11 The Pokémon passes its item to an ally that has used up an item.
Torrent 13 Powers up Water-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.
Truant -74 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
Water Veil 16 The Pokémon is covered with a water veil, which prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
